title: RadCats Karaoke
description: A karaoke rhythm game with live session for multiple users, customizable lyrics timing, and 3D elements. Winner of the Best Functionality award for the University of Washington's Winter 2020/21 Coding Bootcamp. Login in and demo the project with USERNAME: 'radcat' PASSWORD: 'password'. (sorry for slow loading times - currently deployed on free heroku service)

title: Voicely
description: Online notepad that recognizes and transcribes voice into text, with the ability to parse matching text to emoji. Winner of the Best Functionality and People's Choice awards for the Winter 2020 University of Washington coding bootcamp.

title: Memory Bank
description: Pause and reflect on your daily horoscope and mental space. Save each day's reflection as a memory in your memory bank.

title: Team Page Generator
description: Command line tool to build a professional webpage with color codeded contact cards for each employee or team member.

title: Weather e.Port
description: Allows a user to search for a City, State, or Country to explore the weather data hosted on OpenWeatherMap.org. Also reports today's UV-index, color coded to help you stay safe out there.
